name: SpaceJunk (R-No, CodeHard, NielsBernaerdt, NielsDelanghe, PeakAlive)
description:
Collect junk and return order to the galaxy! SpaceJunk is a 2-4 local multiplayer game, focused on scoring more points than the other players. Maneuver your ship and bring in multiple pieces of junk at once to score combo points and tip the balance to your advantage. But be aware! There is chaos in space! Avoid collision with asteroids & other players or physics will do its thing and your collected garbage will float away.
